name: Vagrant-Ansible on CentOS 6.5
description: Spins off a CentOS VM using vagrant, and provisions the app with vagrant-ansible provisioner.

name: Docker with Docker Compose
description: Runs two containers - one for the application, one for mongo, using docker-compose

name: Kubernetes Locally
description: Kubernetes installation using Kube bundled with Docker for Mac. Creates the app Service and a Mongo Replica Set. Most of it will work in the cloud as well
